rukus.text: Vos noted history Abraham's prenobilis guests
They visited eum dictus Pax. He dictus Pax to vos strangers
He asked his familia prepare fat calf
When he offered it them he remarked vos non eat
He harbored fear de them! They dictus non Habet fear they dedit bonus news knowledgeable filius
His uxor astonished Noting eam wrinkled face ego est sterile veteris femina
They dictus Sic dictus tuus Dominus. He est the Multus Wise Omniscient
He dictus Quod est vos up to O messengers
They dictus Nos dispatched criminal people
Nos shower them rocks clay
Signum tuus Dominus transgressors
Nos tunc delivered totus believers
Nos non invenit it absque 1 domus submitters
Nos set it lesson those fear painful retribution
(In Moses ibi est lesson). Nos sent eum Pharaoh manifest proofs
he turned in arrogance dictus Magician crazy
Consequently nos punished eum his troops Nos threw them sea he est 1 blame

Anything it advenit upon utterly destroyed

people Noah ante ut; they est wicked people
